description: A technical cold-weather climbing hoody made with our durable, stretch-woven fabric, the Chockstone Winter Full Zip offers high-performance protection for winter cragging days, summers in the alpine, and everything in between. The fabric's brushed backer adds a soft touch of warmth, while angled, harness-compatible pockets provide secure access to small essentials.
name: Mountain Hardwear Winter Journey Full Zip Hoody - Mens
